m_4w8bn3riv8E03O0.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mcUfMS4ZURPrbo_VO.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

tviKJou99ZD9pdhyQ.name: Indomitable
tviKJou99ZD9pdhyQ.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

mItCVasyAec67dh61.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

t5L_xS2FpmSotKRrm.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

mxOsawEcLj77Mb4Rs.name: Diffuse
mxOsawEcLj77Mb4Rs.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

ma3RQCkzJX6C9tK9F.name: Homogenous
ma3RQCkzJX6C9tK9F.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mJxwuxXvjDL8I_9Fc.name: No Blood
mJxwuxXvjDL8I_9Fc.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mAyZi8BETSVvmODz_.name: No Brain
mAyZi8BETSVvmODz_.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mHp9mpe6_KMVcERP5.name: No Eyes
mHp9mpe6_KMVcERP5.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mLQBBhBepSiGS8zyK.name: No Head
mLQBBhBepSiGS8zyK.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mnKY7LZldH9bOBJQP.name: No Neck
mnKY7LZldH9bOBJQP.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mNFVcuE9ZIS0ggaEv.name: No Vitals
mNFVcuE9ZIS0ggaEv.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mUGD543ZkOsfzFcq5.name: Unliving
mUGD543ZkOsfzFcq5.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

tBey68iWha9yrEtpG.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

m0l1Yao8lxRyB0CKM.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mbpXws_A-iYh2pawm.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mBDd72p9xOJe0M_DU.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

tfp9G7ikY2xfIKnHc.name: Single-Minded
tfp9G7ikY2xfIKnHc.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

toiBD0hzyO7Pr3NYq.name: Unfazeable
toiBD0hzyO7Pr3NYq.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

ths5go567SqDYtG_A.name: Hidebound
ths5go567SqDYtG_A.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

tdJQK7Vxn7plHveZM.name: Incurious
tdJQK7Vxn7plHveZM.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!
